resources.string: To start demonstration say \"oh mighty computer\".
Say \"call\", \"turn\", \"open\", \"play\", "pause" or \"open\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example.
To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
Say Tom, Kevin or John to call any one of them.
Say some program bluetooth, music or maps to close.
Say some program bluetooth, music or maps to open.
Name a city source to city destination in the form of \"source\" to \"destination\"
